mapper.select: SELECT * FROM HAON_ROOM WHERE ROOM_NAME LIKE '무궁화%'
SELECT * FROM HAON_ROOM WHERE ROOM_NAME LIKE '소나무%'
SELECT * FROM HAON_ROOM WHERE ROOM_NAME LIKE '사랑채%'
SELECT * FROM HAON_ROOM WHERE ROOM_NAME LIKE '백두산%'
SELECT * FROM HAON_ROOM WHERE ROOM_NAME = #{room_name} AND ROOM_TYPE = #{room_type}
